reviews.review: really fun game to play with friends

Alright so this is my first review, but I got to say this is by far one of my favorite games! I enjoy the quarterly releases of new content. I myself main as survivor, mainly solo queuing, and find playing Killer really difficult but it is a nice challenge when I do try.

First off, you will not always have a great game! There are people who just enjoy making the game not fun for you and what can I say, just deal with it and move on. You win some you lose some. As survivor, I wonder what is wrong with other survivors at times! Also, I always thank the killer for their time, even if they were campy. I figure they are trying out ways to enjoy the game too and I figure if I can't rescue a survivor from a campy killer then I just have to get good!

I have made many pretty cool friends because of this game and I mostly enjoy watching content created around this game. Give it a shot if you haven't already done so and if you aren't good at it then don't fret, just keep trying! I go to say that the amount of times I have died in this game far outways the amount of times I have survived! I embrace my suckiness! Try it sometimes, you might have some fun!
all killer op
its great

Since the new update, nerfing survivor perks into oblivion this game is simply put. Dogshit. There's no consistent way to combat a killer unless you play with 4 friends and co-ordinate to a level which isnt possible with randoms. Whats the point in playing the game if all free and immediate content perks are practically useless in game. Only good perk builds for survivors I've seen are incredibly situational or have major disadvantages or in general need to be paid for with iridescent shards or in game currency. This shit is boring and unfair as its near impossible to run a killer round and killers can still have insane perk builds.

Great game to play with friends! Different than anything like Apex or Among Us, I like the twist to this one and it really does take team work to successfully win a game. I hope to see more horror franchises join in in the future!

So I've played this game for a little bit of time... And I would have to say no, I don't recommend it. There are so many anti-fun components from: forcing survivors to bleed out for 5+ minutes, camping hook, tunneling, teammate griefing, broken perks/addons that take all skill out of the game.
The primary component of escaping, completing generators, is the least exciting part of the game. So you have a team of 4 people not wanting to do generators and farming teammates for points since the ranking up system is sh*t. 
This game is more interested in releasing the newest killer/survivor and getting more of your money than actually trying to fix these game-ruining components that make it IMPOSSIBLE for me to even enjoy 1 round of this game anymore.
Trash

For my first month, this game was enjoyable with my group of friends who were all new. Since several recent nerfs to survivor, it's nearly impossible to survive. Devs consistently nerf survivors and buff killers, without realizing that killers will always have a clear advantage. Killers are mostly toxic, and hold the game hostage. If you're super sweaty and run specific perks (that are locked behind the paywall of various survivors you have to pay for), you MIGHT have a chance. If you've never played, don't bother. It's in a really bad spot.
